::: {.minipage data-latex="{\textwidth}"}
## `SetTextHighlighting`

Sets how to highlight content in formatted reports\index{highlighted reports!how to highlight} for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetTextHighlighting(TextHighlight highlighting)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`TextHighlight`](#texthighlight) highlighting | How to highlight content. |
:::
